project_info.name: Moltbot
project_info.description: An open-source, local-first AI assistant that runs on your own devices and performs autonomous tasks.

news_items.title: It's incredible. It's terrifying. It's MoltBot.
news_items.summary: Jason Meller from 1Password explores MoltBot (formerly Clawd Bot), a local-first AI agent. The article praises its autonomous capabilities like planning and memory but highlights significant security risks regarding plaintext credential storage.

news_items.title: GitHub - moltbot/moltbot: Your own personal AI assistant
news_items.summary: The official repository for Moltbot. It is described as a local-first, multimodal AI assistant that connects to messaging apps (WhatsApp, Telegram) and can control your local machine.

news_items.title: Attacking AI Agents: The MoltBot Case Study
news_items.summary: Cisco Talos security researchers analyze MoltBot as a case study for AI agent vulnerabilities. They discuss how unauthenticated admin ports and lack of sandboxing can lead to remote code execution.

news_items.title: Building a Personal AI Assistant with Moltbot on DigitalOcean
news_items.summary: A tutorial on how to deploy Moltbot on a DigitalOcean Droplet. It covers setting up the environment, connecting to Telegram, and configuring basic skills for remote server management.

news_items.title: Moltbot: The Risks of Local AI Agents
news_items.summary: The Register covers the security findings regarding Moltbot, emphasizing the 'terrifying' potential of granting an AI agent full access to a user's local file system and shell without adequate guardrails.

news_items.title: Moltbot Documentation: Voice Wake & Talk Mode
news_items.summary: Official documentation detailing Moltbot's voice capabilities. It explains how to configure 'Voice Wake' for hands-free interaction and 'Talk Mode' for continuous conversation using ElevenLabs.

news_items.title: Understanding Agentic Security with Moltbot
news_items.summary: SocPrime publishes a deep dive into threat model of autonomous agents. Moltbot is used to demonstrate how 'tool use' by LLMs can be exploited via prompt injection to perform unauthorized actions.

news_items.title: Moltbot: Live Canvas and UI Automation
news_items.summary: Documentation on 'Live Canvas' feature, which allows Moltbot to interact with and manipulate a visual workspace, providing a bridge between text-based AI and graphical user interfaces.

news_items.title: Introduction to Local AI Agents: Moltbot Review
news_items.summary: DataCamp reviews Moltbot as part of a broader look at local AI tools. They highlight its ease of use for developers but warn beginners about complexity of securing it properly.

news_items.title: Moltbot Security Discussion
news_items.summary: Michael Tsai curates a collection of reactions and analysis regarding Moltbot security revelations, linking to 1Password article and other community commentary.

news_items.title: Dev.to: My Experience Running Moltbot Locally
news_items.summary: A developer shares their hands-on experience setting up Moltbot on a MacBook M2. The post covers installation hurdles, configuring WhatsApp bridge, and 'magic' of having an AI control the terminal.

news_items.title: Moltbot Docs: Security Best Practices
news_items.summary: Crucial documentation page outlining how to secure a Moltbot instance. It details configuration options for 'DM Access Control' and how to pair trusted users while blocking unknown interactions.

news_items.title: TipRanks: 1Password Exec Warns of Moltbot Risks
news_items.summary: TipRanks covers financial and industry angle of 1Password report, noting how security vulnerabilities in popular AI tools could impact enterprise adoption of agentic AI.

news_items.title: Moltbot Integration: Browser Control
news_items.summary: Documentation on Moltbot's browser automation capabilities. It describes specialized Chrome instance that allows the agent to take snapshots, fill forms, and navigate the web.

news_items.title: Moltbot Community Skills Library
news_items.summary: The 'ClawdHub' or skills library documentation, showing how developers can create and share new capabilities for Moltbot, effectively extending its functionality via community plugins.

news_items.title: Moltbot GitHub Issues
news_items.summary: The active issues tracker for Moltbot project. Users report bugs, request features, and discuss roadmap. A key place to see the current state of development.

news_items.title: Moltbot GitHub Releases
news_items.summary: The release history of Moltbot, documenting evolution from 'Clawdbot' to the current version, including changelogs for new features like 'Lobster' shell and various bug fixes.

news_items.title: Moltbot Official Website
news_items.summary: The landing page for Moltbot project, summarizing its philosophy: a personal AI assistant that runs anywhere, connects to anything, and is fully owned by the user.

news_items.title: 1Password Community: Discussing Moltbot
news_items.summary: A discussion thread on 1Password community forum where users debate best ways to manage secrets for local AI agents like Moltbot, triggered by the blog post.

news_items.title: Reddit: r/LocalLLM Moltbot Thread
news_items.summary: A thread in r/LocalLLM subreddit discussing 'Moltbot' launch and its security implications. Users compare it to other local agent frameworks like AutoGPT.
